projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with modern UI and secure payment processing
projects.fullDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce platform built with React and Node.js, featuring user authentication, product management, shopping cart functionality, and secure payment processing with Stripe integration. The platform includes an admin dashboard for inventory management and order tracking.
features: Product catalog with search and filtering

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: Collaborative task management tool with real-time updates and team features
projects.fullDescription: A sophisticated task management application that enables teams to collaborate effectively. Built with Vue.js and Firebase, it features real-time synchronization, drag-and-drop task organization, team member assignments, and progress tracking with detailed analytics.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive weather dashboard with location-based forecasts and data visualization
projects.fullDescription: An intuitive weather dashboard that provides comprehensive weather information with beautiful data visualizations. Features include location-based weather data, 7-day forecasts, interactive charts, weather maps, and the ability to save favorite locations for quick access.

projects.title: Social Media Platform
projects.description: Modern social networking platform with real-time messaging and content sharing
projects.fullDescription: A feature-rich social media platform that connects users through posts, real-time messaging, and community features. Built with React and Socket.io for real-time interactions, it includes user profiles, news feeds, image sharing, and a comprehensive notification system.
features: News feed with posts and media
